Detailed Description

Internal implementation class for OBEX transport interfaces.

Warning;
This is an internal implementation class which must not be used outside APOXI OBEX at all.

It provides an implementation of the ObexAbstractPort interface suitable for client connections which is mainly a two-level nested state machine. The first level is implemented by ObexClientPort itself and represents the port state. The second level is used only temporarily to track the asynchronous execution of the following procedures:

  • Address resolution (device search and service discovery).

  • Establishing a transport connection.

  • Disconnecting a transport connection.

The 2nd level state descriptions and there actions are inherited from the base class.

ObexClientPort::ObexClientPort (  ObexAbstractTransport &  transport,
ObexProtocol &  protocol,
ObexClientDispatcher &  client
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
transport Instance of the transport implementation (HW abstraction) related to the transport.
protocol Instance of the transport adapter related to the transport and the OBEX-based protocol to be used with the port.
client Instance of an ObexClientDispatcher to handle the protocol events received by the port.
